message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this item which I believe you would find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $140. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I appreciate the offer, but I am only able to pay up to $120 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $120 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $130?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I am willing to pay $125 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
